channel.title: WebClient Making Tutorial - THEN HELP ME!
channel.description:
Hello!
Today I Will Be Teaching You How To Make A Webclient!
[b]Chapter 1, Getting Winrar[/b]
Well, The First Thing You Will Need Is Winrar. Here Is The Link: http://www.win-rar.com/
Click "Download"
And Than Click The Big Blue "Button"
Extract The File. Than Open It.
[b]Chapter 2, Getting A Client.[/b]
Here Are Some Client That I Am Familiar With.
[b]MoparScape 377 Cache[/b] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=IJLPWP90 Credits: Not 100% Sure.
[b]EyreScape Client[/b] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=01SH1FJJ Credits: Skating On Java
[b]ScapeRune[/b] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3G8V80W1 [b]Credits: Whiteboy5[/b]
Now, Extract It By Right Clicking It, And Clicking Extract Here.
[b]MORE CLIENTS TO COME.[/b]
Now, Lets Make The Webclient!
[b]You Need A Website.[/b]
There Are Plenty Of Free Domains Over The Web. Sign Up For One. And You're Set.
[b]NOTE:[/b] Custom Sprites Will Not Work.
Next, If You Want Your Own Background, You Will Have To Upload One.
I Prefer www.photobucket.com
[b]Chapter 3, Changing The Background[/b]
Go Into Class_30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.Java
Search For [code]Image Image =[/code] Replace The URL That Is Between The " " With The Background You Uploaded.
And Than Compile.
[b]Chapter 4, Signing And Jaring[/b]
You Need To Download JarMaker: http://www.mediafire.com/?9lfglzgguzz
Next, Run The Jar Maker/Signer, And Open The JarMaker Tab. Set The Output Directory To Your Client Folder. You Can Change The Application Jar To Whatever You Want, Keep The .Jar Part Though. Set The Input Directory To Your Clients Folder. Then Hit The Manifest Template Button, For Main Class Put Client. Then Hit The Set Manifest Button, Than Click The Create Jar! Button.
You Just Made A Jar! NOW.. Sign It.
[b]Jar Signing[/b]
Click The Jar Signer Tab. Hit the Jar Signer tab. For The Output File Put The Path To Your Clients Folder, And Change The Application.jar To (Put Client Name).jar For The Signed Jar File Put Signed_JARNAME For The Jarsigner Path, Put The Path To Your Jarsigner. It Should Be Something Like What Is Already There. Then Hit The Generate Keystore button. For Keytool Location, Put The Path To keytool.exe (Should Be Something Similar). For Output Keystore File Put The Path To Your Client Folder, And Put Keystore As The Filename. Fill in all of the other boxes. And Hit Generate Keystore. Then For The Keystore File, Put The Path To The One You Just Made. Which Should Be In Clients Folder. And Fill Out The Keystore Alias, Public Key, And Private Key (Set Them At Whatever You Wish). And Than Click Sign Jar!
[img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/7038/signedjarzw6nv3.png[/img]
Thanks m.dog311 For The Pic!
IF THAT APPEARS WHEN YOU RUN THE CLIENT, THAN THE JAR IS SIGNED CORRECTLY!
Now Upload The .Jar File To The Website That You Got For Free.
Almost Done!
Open Up Notepad And Put This In:
[code]<html> <title>WEBCLIENT NAME</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="JAR URL" code="client"> </applet></center> </html>[/code]
Change The WEBCLIENT NAME To The Name Of The Webclient. And The JAR URL To The Url To The Jar.
Save That As Client.html And Upload It To Your Site.
Congrats! You Have Just Made A Webclient!
Credits: 60% Me , 25% To M.Dog311 , 15% To All The Client Makers!
[b]NOTE: Any Problem With This Tutorial? PM ME![/b]
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
I found this tutorial (NOT MINE.) And I have a problem. When I try to sign the jar, it comes up with this:
[size=13pt]Unable to sign JAR file. Caused by: jarsigner error: java.lang.RuntimeException: keystore load: invalid keystore format[/size]

item.title: WebClient Making Tutorial - THEN HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @valiken valiken
item.description:
@valiken wrote:

Hello!

Today I Will Be Teaching You How To Make A Webclient!

Chapter 1, Getting Winrar

Well, The First Thing You Will Need Is Winrar. Here Is The Link: http://www.win-rar.com/

Click “Download”

And Than Click The Big Blue “Button”

Extract The File. Than Open It.

Chapter 2, Getting A Client.

Here Are Some Client That I Am Familiar With.

MoparScape 377 Cache
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=IJLPWP90
Credits: Not 100% Sure.

EyreScape Client
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=01SH1FJJ
Credits: Skating On Java

ScapeRune
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3G8V80W1
Credits: Whiteboy5

Now, Extract It By Right Clicking It, And Clicking Extract Here.

MORE CLIENTS TO COME.

Now, Lets Make The Webclient!

You Need A Website.

There Are Plenty Of Free Domains Over The Web. Sign Up For One. And You’re Set.

NOTE: Custom Sprites Will Not Work.

Next, If You Want Your Own Background, You Will Have To Upload One.

I Prefer www.photobucket.com

Chapter 3, Changing The Background

Go Into Class_30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.Java

Search For

Image Image =

Replace The URL That Is Between The " " With The Background You Uploaded.

And Than Compile.

Chapter 4, Signing And Jaring

You Need To Download JarMaker: http://www.mediafire.com/?9lfglzgguzz

Next, Run The Jar Maker/Signer, And Open The JarMaker Tab.
Set The Output Directory To Your Client Folder. You Can Change The Application Jar To Whatever You Want, Keep The .Jar Part Though.
Set The Input Directory To Your Clients Folder.
Then Hit The Manifest Template Button, For Main Class Put Client.
Then Hit The Set Manifest Button, Than Click The Create Jar! Button.

You Just Made A Jar!
NOW… Sign It.

Jar Signing

Click The Jar Signer Tab. Hit the Jar Signer tab.
For The Output File Put The Path To Your Clients Folder, And Change The Application.jar To (Put Client Name).jar
For The Signed Jar File Put Signed_JARNAME
For The Jarsigner Path, Put The Path To Your Jarsigner.
It Should Be Something Like What Is Already There.
Then Hit The Generate Keystore button.
For Keytool Location, Put The Path To keytool.exe (Should Be Something Similar).
For Output Keystore File Put The Path To Your Client Folder, And Put Keystore As The Filename.
Fill in all of the other boxes. And Hit Generate Keystore.
Then For The Keystore File, Put The Path To The One You Just Made. Which Should Be In Clients Folder.
And Fill Out The Keystore Alias, Public Key, And Private Key (Set Them At Whatever You Wish).
And Than Click Sign Jar!

Thanks m.dog311 For The Pic!

IF THAT APPEARS WHEN YOU RUN THE CLIENT, THAN THE JAR IS SIGNED CORRECTLY!

Now Upload The .Jar File To The Website That You Got For Free.

Almost Done!

Open Up Notepad And Put This In:

[code]

WEBCLIENT NAME [/code]

Change The WEBCLIENT NAME To The Name Of The Webclient.
And The JAR URL To The Url To The Jar.

Save That As Client.html And Upload It To Your Site.

Congrats! You Have Just Made A Webclient!

Credits: 60% Me , 25% To M.Dog311 , 15% To All The Client Makers!

NOTE: Any Problem With This Tutorial? PM ME!

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
